name: Noble Fate, Mahitra
description: Summons the soul of Noble Fate, Mahitra for 8 sec. While the soul is summoned, increases own Crit DMG by 50%, deals 43992 DMG to enemy every 0.5 sec, and increases M.DMG the target takes by 25% for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon Dealing DMG 120 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases the duration of the effect by 5 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases all allies' ATK by 30% and Crit DMG by 30% for the duration of Skill.

name: Crystallized Technomagic, Rascal
description: Summons the soul of Crystallized Technomagic, Rascal, recovering Mana of all allies by 300 every sec for 10 sec. Self activates Overcharge and increases M.DMG all enemies take by 30% for the duration.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement  Phase 1
Fully recovers Mana for the duration of skill.

Advancement Phase 2
The duration of Skill increases by 4 sec, and self gains immunity to CC for the duration of Skill.

name: Clear Blue Sky, Sherrkyle
description: Summon the soul of Clear Blue Sky, Sherrkyle, dealing 111456 M.DMG to all enemies and marks Judgement Sigil for 15 sec. Afterward, increases own Crit DMG by 100% for 11 sec.
charge_type: Charges up over 18 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
For the Duration of Skill, reduces Cooldown of self's all Skills by 1 sec every sec.

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration of Skill, attacks a random enemy, dealing 83592 M.DMG every 1 sec and marking Judgement Sigil for 15 sec. If the target is already marked with a Judgement Sigil, dealing 83592 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF.

name: Brilliant Praise, Brauxio
description: Summons the soul of Brilliant Praise, Brauxio for 8 sec, increasing all allies' ATK by 40% and DEF by 40%.
charge_type: Charges up upon dealing DMG 150 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces DMG all allies take from enemies by 30% for the duration of the Skill.

Advancement Phase 2
Dispels negative effects from all allies and dispels positive effects from all enemies every 1 sec for the duration of the Skill.

name: Solar Halo, Ignisius
description: Summons the soul of Solar Halo, Ignisius, increasing own P.DEF by 60% for 10 sec. Afterward, attacks the target and the enemies nearby within a small range 20 times, dealing a total of 118740 M.DMG. Each hit inflicts 'Judgement of Ignisius', increasing M.DMG the target takes by 2% for 5 sec. 'Judgement of Ignisius' can be stacked up to 10 times.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Each stack of 'Judgement of Ignisius' also reduces the target's M.DEF by 2%

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the duration of 'Judgement of Ignisius' by 5 sec, and changes the max number of stacks to 20 times.

name: God's Book, Genesis
description: Summons the soul of God's Book, Genesis, increasing the number of targets of normal attacks to 2 for 10 sec, healing HP of all allies by 92864 and dispelling negative effects every 2 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes Skill Activation Requirements of the Soul Weapon to 4.

Advancement Phase 2
Reduces All DMG that allies take by 30% and increases their Heal Rate by 50% for the duration of Skill.

name: Kiln of Futility, Targarios
description: Summons the soul of Kiln of Futility, Targarios, attack all enemies every sec for 10 sec, dealing 13492 M.DMG. Whenever dealing DMG on the enemy, absorbs its power to increase DMG dealt to enemies by 2% for 10 sec. This effect stacks up to 15 times.
charge_type: Charges up upon dealing DMG 70 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Stuns the target for 1 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Max stacks for the effect is changed to 30.

name: Might of the God King, Tyrannicus
description: Summons the soul of Might of the God King, Tyrannicus, dealing 175968 P.DMG to enemies within range of self, and inflicting time stop for 4 sec. Afterwards, increases own ATK by 50% for 10 sec. While time stop is active, Normal and Skill attacks cannot be used, and Cooldown is fixed.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Heals HP of allies within range by 351930 over 10 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Dispels positiv effects of all enemies in range.

name: Aurelian Whisper, Goldbreeze
description: Summons the soul of Aurelian Whisper, Goldbreeze for 10 sec, increasing ATK Spd of all allies by 300, dealing 46432 M.DMG to all enemies, and increasing M.DMG they take 25% for 10 sec. Upon this Skill at the Arena, inflicts Charm to all enemies for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 3 times.

Advancement Phase 2
Upon activation, recovers Mana of all allies by 2000 and increases Crit DMG by 80% for the duration of Skill.

name: Supersonic Tempest, Gigantix
description: Summons the soul of Supersonic Tempest, Gigantix for 12 sec. Normal and Skill attacks have a 10% chance to deal 40665 P.DMG to the target and enemies within a small range of it, inflicting stun for 1 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 7 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases own ATK by 40% for the duration of Skill.

Advancement Phase 2
Activation chance is increased to 20%.

name: Blood Lancer Monolith
description: Summons the soul of Blood Lancer Monolith, dealing 89952 P.DMG to nearby enemies of self and knocking them down for 4 sec. Afterward, recovers own HP equal to 40% of Max HP, increasing ATK by 30% and Heal Rate by 30% for 10 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon dealing DMG 60 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes the duration of the effect to 15 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration of Skill, increases own DMG dealt to enemies by 20%. Normal attacks have a 10% chance to stun the target for 1.5 sec.

name: Prism Nova, Arc Lumineir
description:
Summons the soul of Prism Nova, Arc lumineir for 10 sec. For the duration of the Skill, the soul attack according to the Light Chrisha owns every 3 sec.
'Red Light' - Attacks the enemy and deals 76248 M.DMG that ignores DEF.
'Blue Light' - Attack all enemies, dealing 50832 M.DMG and recovering all allies' 1 orb of Mana.
'Green Light' - Attacks 2 enemies, dealing 127080 M.DMG and reducing targets ATK by 35% for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces Skill Activation Requirement to 4 times.

Advancement Phase 2
All effects will be enhanced.
[Red Light] - DMG increases by 50%.
[Blue Light] - Mana Recovery increases by 100%.
[Green Light] - ATK Reduction changes to 50%.

name: The Guardian, Exian
description: Summons the soul of The Guardian, Exian, increasing P.DEF of all allies by 70% for 12 sec. For the duration of the Skill, normal attacks stun the target for 1 sec.
charge_type: Charges up every sec and every time self takes DMG. This Skill can be cast upon gaining 80 charges.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
For the Duration of the Skill, normal attacks reduce the target's P.DEF by 5% for 5 sec. The P.DEF reduction effect stacks up to max 7 times.

Advancement Phase 2
Upon activation, reduces P.DMG the ally with the highest ATK takes by 80% for 6 sec, and increases ATK equal to 100% of clauses P.DEF. This effect is irremovable.

name: Primal Flame, Flenos
description: Summons the Soul of Primal Flame, Flenos, dealing 146640 M.DMG to 5 enemies. Dealing DMG to enemies with this Skill increases DEF Penetration by 25 for 60 sec. This effect stacks up to 20 times.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 6 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases DMG by 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases DMG by 50%. Each stack grants 2.5% ATK Boost effect.

name: Hellhound, Akistra
description: Summons the soul of Hellhound, Arkistra for 15 sec. When Crow casts [Even Gods shall die.], it deals additional 203228 P.DMG. At max charge, deals 100% increased DMG. The soul disappears after dealing DMG.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
DMG is increased by 80%.

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration fo Skill, increases own ATK by 40%.

name: Lake of Remembrance, Armekith
description: Summons the soul of Lake of Remembrance, Armekith, creating a tidal wave, dealing 175968 M.DMG to enemies within wide frontal range of self and knocking them down for 3 sec. Dakaris then heals 117312 HP and 1 orbs of Mana to allies within range. Afterward, absorbs the soul of Lake of Remembrance, Armekith, increasing own ATK by 60% for 10 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 7 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Dispels positiv effects of enemies and negative effects of allies within range.

Advancement Phase 2
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements to 5 times, and for the duration of Skill, the number of targets of [May Their Agony End!] increases to 2.

name: Corrupted Holy Sword, Aea
description:
Summons the soul of Corrupted Holy Sword, Aea for 10 sec, increasing own ATK by 50 and judging enemies upon Skill use.
[Judgment Blade] Deals 67464 P.DMG to the enemy with the highest ATK and enemies in a circular range of the target, reducing their Mana by 1000.
[Doom] Deals 112440 P.DMG with 500 increased DEF Penetration to the enemy with the highest ATK and nearby enemies in a circular range of the target
charge_type: Charges up upon dealing DMG 80 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 60 times and Mana Reduction to 2000.

Advancement Phase 2
Changes the duration of Soul to 15 sec and increases DMG dealt to enemies by 20% for the duration.

name: The Blue Light, Arpheus
description: Summons the soul of The Blue Light, Arpheus, increasing all allies' P.Crit Resistance by 300 and P.Block Chance by 300 for 10 sec. Afterward, places [Mana Source of Blue Light] around self for 10 sec. For the duration of [Mana Source of Blue Light], deals a total of 98960 P.DMG to enemies within range over 9 times and reduces their Mana by 300. At the end of duration, creates an explosion that deals 118752 P.DMG and silences enemies within range for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Allies within [Mana Source of Blue Light] have their ATK Spd increases by 300 and recover 300 Mana every sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Continuously dispels positive effects placed upon enemies that are within [Mana Source of Blue Light] and changes the duration of Silence to 8 sec.

name: Tears of the Moon, Nerius
description: Summons the soul of Tears of the Moon, Nerius, dealing 111456 M.DMG to frontal enemies and inflicting them with [Curse of the Moon] for 10 sec. Targets inflicted by [Curse of the Moon] take 25% increased M.DMG and have their Heal Rate reduced by 25%. Afterward, increases own Crit DMG by 50%.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases DMG by 50% and changes the M.DMG Boost effect to 45%.

Advancement Phase 2
For the Duration of Skill, increases own ATK by 40%.

name: Ancient Valor, Seliere
description: Summons the soul of Ancient Valor, Seliere, increasing P.Block chance of all allies by 500 for 10 sec. Afterward, deals 39584 M.DMG near self every 3 sec and inflicts the target with Silence for 1 sec, creating a shield that grants immunity to CC and absorbs DMG equal to 300% of Dosarta's ATK for 4 sec on an ally with the lowest HP.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 6 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases M.DMG the hit enemy takes by 25% for 5 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Changes the number of targets applied by the shield to 3.

name: The Seductress, Guillotine
description: Summons the Soul of The Seductress, Guillotine, and increases own ATK by 40% for 8 sec. For the duration of Skill, Normal and Skill attacks have a 20% chance to deal 37032 M.DMG that ignores DEF to a target. If [Absorbing Blow] hits a target, this effect will activate with a 100% chance.
charge_type: Charges up over 18 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Activation chance changes to 30%, and DMG increases by 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
The M.DMG now ignores Block, and hit enemy takes 30% increased M.DMG for 7 sec.

name: Essence of Greed, Perion
description: Summons the soul of Essence of Greed, Perion for 7 sec. Every Skill attack grants a stack of 'Essence of Greed'. After 7 sec, the soul explodes and deals 148128 P.DMG to all enemies. The DMG of this Skill increases by 1% for every 'Essence of Greed' stacks gained for the duration. 'Essence of Greed' can be stacked up to max 30 times.
charge_type: Charges up over 22 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Each stack of 'Essence of Greed' deals 2% DMG.

Advancement Phase 2
Max number of stacks of 'Essence of Greed' increases by 30, and DMG dealt at max stack of 'Essence of Greed' increases by 150%.

name: Wanderer's Pleasure, Lu Etrona Dice
description: Summons the soul of Wanderer's Pleasure, Lu Etrona Dice, and rolls the dice. Depending on the number of the dice's dots, immediately reduces Cooldown of Esker's next Soul Weapon use by 10% and increases ATK of all allies by 12% for 60 sec. The ATK Boost effect can be stacked up to max 5 times.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 6 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes the max number of stacks to 7.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases DEF Penetration of all allies by 50 per every stack.

name: Small Synthesized Darkness, Naav Gehen
description: Summons the soul of Small Synthesized Darkness, Naav Gehen for 10 sec, periodically healing HP of all allies by 46432 and recovering Mana of all allies by 300 over 7 times.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases Heal Rate by 40% and changes Mana Recovery to 500.

Advancement Phase 2
Periodically reduces Evan's Skill Cooldown by 2 sec.

name: Jailer of Despair Barbatos
description: Summons the soul of Jailer of Despair, Barbatos for 12 sec, dealing 111096 M.DMG to nearby enemies within a circular range of self, increasing own ATK by 50%. For the duration of Skill, if Ezekiel is in Fury State, he can still be controlled and will not consume HP upon Skill use. After Skill use, gains 1 stack(s) of Cursed Blood. Cursed Blood stacks gained from this Skill can also be gained during Fury State.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 6 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Gains 1 additional Cursed Blood stack(s).

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration of Skill, increases own DMG dealt to enemies by 30%.

name: Angel's Despair, Rosmerta
description: Summons the soul of Angel's Despair, Rosmerta, increasing DMG of Heaven's Vengeance by 50% for 10 sec, and applies [Angel's Despair] to all enemies, reducing their ATK by 25%. Afterward, delivers [Judgement of the Fallen Angel] to a random enemy and nearby every 1 sec, dealing 30180 M.DMG each hit and reducing ATK Spd by 100 for 10 sec. The ATK Spd reduction effect can be stack up to max 5 times.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by 4 sec, and changes ATK Reduction of [Angel's Despair] to 40%.

Advancement Phase 2
Each hit dispels positive effects from target and increases All DMG the target takes by 40% for 10 sec.

name: Twinswords of Fury, Veralta
description:
Summons the soul of Twinswords of Fury, Veralta for 10 sec. For the Duration of Skill, the DMG of Normal attacks is increased by 50%, and Fluss' Skills are enhanced.
[Tempest Blade] Attack the target and the enemies nearby 3 times, dealing a total of 103689 additional P.DMG and reducing the Heal Rate of the hit target by 30% for 5 sec.
[Flashstep] Increases own Crit DMG by 100% for 10 sec.
[Bloody Petals] Deals a total of 236992 P.DMG to one enemy over 16 attacks. The Mark effect of [Flashstep] will not be applied to this Skill.
charge_type: Charges up upon Dealing DMG 70 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Charges the duration of the Soul Weapon to 15 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration of Skill, each attack has a 100% chance to reduce Cooldown of self's all Skills by 2%.

name: God's Authority, Rosmerta
description: Summons the soul of God's Authority, Rosmarta for 12 sec. Healing HP of 1 ally with the lowest HP by 55718 every sec. Additionally, attack the enemy with the highest ATK and enemies nearby it every 1 sec, dealing 23216 M.DMG and inflicting stun for 1 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Duration of the soul is changed to 15 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases Heal Rate by 50%, and healed target block all incoming attacks for 5 sec.

name: Holy Bird, Numinu
description: Summons the soul of Holy Bird, Numinu, increasing own ATK by 60% for 8 sec. Upon activation, summons the Storm of Numinu in the front for 8 sec, dealing 15741 P.DMG every 0.5 sec to enemies within range and reducing the target's ATK Spd by 100 for 5 sec. The ATK Spd Reduction effect can be stacked up to max 10 times. Enemies with 10 stacks are inflicted with Freeze and take 30% increased P.DMG for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases the duration of Storm of Numinu and soul by 4 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Changes the increased P.DMG the enemies take to 50%, and every hit dispels positive effects from the enemy.

name: Beast Fist, Mastra
description: Summons the soul of Beast Fist, Mastra, dealing 74064 P.DMG that ignores DEF to the enemy with the highest ATK, and increasing own ATK by 50% for 10 sec. For the duration of Skill, increases DMG of [Ultimate Punch!] by 50%. Upon activating [This will hurt!], deals 49376 additional P.DMG that ignores DEF.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Upon using [Ultimate Punch!] for the Duration of Skill, DMG that ignores DEF also applies to targets other than Bosses.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases DMG by 100% and changed DMG Boost of [Ultimate Punch!] to 100%.

name: The Counterattack, Maxithea
description: Summons the soul of The Counterattack, Maxithea, healing all allies' HP by 158336 and increasing DEF by 50% for 10 sec. Afterward, sends the soul charging to the front, dealing 98960 P.DMG to enemies within range and knocking them down for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up every sec and every time self takes DMG. This Skill can be cast upon gaining 80 charges.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
For the duration of Skill, increases own DEF by 50%, and increases ATK of all allies except for self by 40%.

Advancement Phase 2
Upon activation, dispels negative effects from all allies. When the soul charges, it dispels positive effects from all enemies within range, and increases P.DMG the target takes by 25% for 10 sec.

name: Gateway to Purgatory, Pigritia
description: With the power of the Gateway to Purgatory, Pigritia, Gremory transforms into her true form and attacks enemies with a wide frontal range 2 times, dealing a total of 51844 M.DMG. Afterward, she lets out a deafening roar, dealing 23216 M.DMG to enemies within a wide range. Each stack of [Mana Charge] increases DMG of Soul Weapon by 20%.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases DMG by 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the max number of [Mana Charge] stacks by an additional 2.

name: The Playtime, HN-0
description:
Summons the soul of The Playtime, HN-0, increasing Crit DMG by 30% for 60 sec. Afterward, commands 'Attack Order' 3 times every 3 sec, dealing 101664 P.DMG to frontal enemies in a straight line and inflicting Stun for 2 sec. Upon activating this Skill in Guild Battles, additional effects apply, and Crit DMG Boost effect stacks up to 4 times.
[Guild Conquest] - Every time 'Attack Order' activates, hit enemies take 30% increased P.DMG for 5 sec.
[Guild War] - Reduces Skill Activation Requirements to 10 sec.
[Guild Raid] - Upon activation of 'Attack Order', gains 50 Ammo.
charge_type: Charges up over 21 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases DMG by 30%, and changes the max number of stacks to 7 times.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases DMG by 70%. ATK increases by 6% per each stack.

name: Dreams of an Artificial God, Innocentia
description: Summons the soul of Dreams of an Artificial God, Innocentia for 10sec, increasing own ATK by 40%, recovering Mana by 200 every sec, and reducing ATK of all enemies by 30% for the duration of Skill.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes the Skill Activation Requirements to 15sec, and reduces DEF of all enemies by 30% for the duration of Skill.

Advancement Phase 2
Changes the duration of soul to 15 sec and increases DMG dealt to enemies by 20% for the duration of Skill.

name: Coqnuerer of Darkness, Del Terravion
description: Summons the soul of Conquerer of Darkness, Del Terravion, dealing 175968 P.DMG to all enemies and locking hit targets within an irremovable special barrier. Targets within the special barrier cannot receive positive effects and they take 25% increased P.DMG for 8 sec. Afterward, the Skill lasts for 12 sec and increases Isolet's ATK by 30%.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 4 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases the duration of the special barrier by 4 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases Isolet's DMG dealt to non-Hero enemies by 35% for the duration of soul.

name: Unchanging Mind, Erekura
description: Summons the soul of Unchanging Mind, Erekura for 10 sec, increasing Heal Rate of self by 50%. Every 0.5 sec causes 4 random enemies to take 8% increased M.DMG for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times. After 10 sec, removes the stack from target, dealing 15833 M.DMG per stack.
charge_type: Charges up every sec and every time self takes DMG. This Skill can be cast upon gaining 80 charges.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces Activation Requirement to 60.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the max number of Stacks to 10.

name: Hundred-Flavor Banquet, Tempora Fyrr
description:
Summons the Soul of Hundred-Flavor Banquet, Tempora Fyrr for 10 sec and gains additional effects accourding to Juno's status.
While in [Cook from Heaven], increases all allies' All DEF by 50% + euqal to 3% of Juno's ATK.
While in [Cook from Hell], increases all allies' ATK by 30% + euqal to 3% of Juno's ATK.
Upon using the Skill at 2 or more stacks of [Excellent Ingredient], consumes 2 stacks and increases all effect by 50%.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 7 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces Skill Activation Requirement to 5 times.

Advancement Phase 2
While in [Cook from Heaven], reduces All DMG all allies take by 20%.
While in [Cook from Hell], increases All DMG all enemies take by 15%.
The effect of Excellent Ingredient stacks applies to these effects.

name: 0-Form Perpetual Motion Cannon, Heaven Shatterer
description: Summons the soul of 0-Form Perpetual Motion Cannon, Heaven Shatterer for 12 sec. The summoned soul attacks the target continuously, dealing 12708 M.DMG every 0.5 sec. If the attack hits the same target for more than 5 sec, the effect is enhanced, increasing DMG by 100%
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases the duration of the soul by 6 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
The enhanced attack stuns the enemy for 1 sec, and increases its DMG by an additional 100%.

name: The Holy Sword, Aea
description: Summons the soul of the Holy Sword, Aea for 10 sec, increasing own ATK by 30% and All DEF by 30%. The soul of The Holy Sword, Aea follows Kasel around, healing HP of allies within range equal to 5% of their Max HP every sec.
charge_type: Charges up over 19 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Dispels negative effects from the healed ally.

Advancement Phase 2
Deals 67464 P.DMG to enemies within range every sec.

name: The Bluewind, Coventina
description: Summons the soul of The Bluewind, Conventina, recovering Mana of all allies by 2000. Afterward, reduces Heal Rate of all enemies by 30%, increases M.DMG the enemies take by 30% for 10 sec, and attacks a random enemy with lighting every 3 sec. dispelling positiv effects, dealing 46432 M.DMG, and reducing the enemy's Mana by 500. After 10 sec, deals 92864 M.DMG to all enemies and inflicts Stun for 5 sec.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes Heal Rate Reduction effect to 50% and M.DMG Boost effect to 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases DEF Penetration of all allies by 500 for the duration of Skill.

name: Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil
description:
Summons the soul of Midnight Demonic Swords, Night Sky & Dark Shadow & Veil, launching a blow to all enemies within wide frontal range of self that deals 98752 M.DMG, inflicting Stun for 3 sec, and reducing their Mana by 2000. Afterward, increases own ATK by 30% for 10 sec and deals a total of 98752 M.DMG to 1 random enemy over 4 hits every 3 sec. Additional effects will be applied depending on Kibera's selected sword.
[Nocturnal Demonic Sword, Night Sky] - Increases DMG dealt to enemies by 30% for 10 sec.
[Umbral Demonic Blade, Dark Shadow] - Reduces ATK of hit enemies by 40% for 10 sec.
[Darkslayer Demonic Sword, Veil] - DMG ignores DEF.
charge_type: Charges up over 24 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by 2 sec and increases DMG by 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by an additional 4 sec and dispels positive effects of the target.

name: Judgment Edge, Elicipira
description: Summons the soul of Judgment Edge, Elicipira, changing the activation chance of the additional M.DMG effect of Judgment Edge, Elicipira to 10% and reducing All DMG taken by 40% for 10 sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon dealing DMG 60 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
For the duration of Skill, increases ATK by 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the duration of the effect by 5 sec and changes the activation chance of Judgment Edge, Elicipira to 15%.

name: Flowing Circle, Eltoirre
description: Summons the soul of Flowing Circle, Eltoirre for 10 sec, healing all allies' HP by 27859 and mana by 400 every sec.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases the healed ally's M.DEF by 10% and M.Block by 200. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration of the skill, self becomes immune to All DMG and Cooldown of all active Skills is reduced by 1 sec every sec.

name: Lakrak MK-1
description: Summons the soul of Lakrak MK-1, increasing own ATK by 50% for 12 sec. Afterward, deals a total of 152496 P.DMG to enemies within range of a random enemy over 5 times every 4 sec, stunning them for 2 sec and increasing P.DMG they take by 30% for 8 sec.
charge_type: Charges up over 18 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by 2 sec and gains immunity to CC for 12 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by an additional 4 sec, and immediately reduces Cooldown of all Skills by 3 sec every 4 sec.

name: Whispering Sands, Arlaq
description: Summons Whispering Sands, Arlaq for 6 sec, recovering own Mana by 500 every sec, and reducing ATK Spd of enemies within circular range of self by 120. The ATK Spd Reduction effect stacks up to 5 times, and enemies inflicted with 5 stacks take 50% increased M.DMG for 7 sec, and become Petrified.
charge_type: Charges up over 21 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases own ATK by 40% for the duration of the Skill.

Advancement Phase 2
For every sec, dispels positive effects from an enemy within range and deals 44438 M.DMG.

name: Void Soul, Dunn Nemecia
description: Summons the soul of Void Soul, Dunn Nemecia, dealing 69648 M.DMG to all enemies and inflicting them with 'Soul Mischief'. Enemies inflicted with 'Soul Mischief' take 8% increased M.DMG and have their Heal Rate reduced by 8% for 7 sec. Afterward, every time Lavril uses a Skill for 10 sec, she inflicts 69648 M.DMG to all enemies and inflicts them with 'Soul Mischief'. The 'Soul Mischief' effect can be stacked up to max 3 times.
charge_type: Charges up over 22 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes the max number of stacks of 'Soul Mischief' to 4.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the effect of 'Soul Mischief' by 50%.

name: Phoenix Quill, Belisa

Afterward, dispels positive effects of frontal enemies in a straight line and deals 139296 P.DMG.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.

Advancement Phase 1
Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 3 times.

If the target is a Boss, deals 234624 additional M.DMG.

Reduces Cooldown by 8 sec.

name: Flower of Eternity, Hyacinth

Advancement Phase 2
For the Duration of Skill, DMG of 'I'll rip you to pieces!!' increases by 100%.

name: Crest of Extortion, Kaliosk
description: Summons the soul of Crest of Extortion, Kaliosk, for 10 sec, dealing 87984 M.DMG to an enemy with the highest ATK. For the duration of the soul, reduces target's ATK by 20%, Mana by 250 every sec, and increases own ATK by 30%.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 5 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Changes Skill Activation Requirements to 4 times, reduces ATK Reduction effect to 30%, and Boost effect to 50%.

Advancement Phase 2
Upon use, immediately enters Darkness Awakened state for 10 sec.

name: Dragonbane, Svelta
description: Summons the soul of Dragonbane, Svelta for 10 sec, increasing all allies' ATK Spd by 300 and recovering own Mana by 400 every sec. For the duration of Skill, increases All DMG that all enemies take by 20%. If the target enemy is a Dragon, the DMG Boost effect changes to 60%.
charge_type: Charges up over 18 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
The duration of the effect increases by 10 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
For the duration of Skill, increases own ATK by 50%.

name: Starry Sky Weaver, Mellifluo
description: Summons the soul of Starry Sky Weaver, Mellifluo, resetting the Cooldown of [Blinding Karma]. Afterward, attacks the enemy, dealing 111456 M.DMG, reducing Heal Rate by 50% for 10 sec, and inflicting 'Threading Destiny' for 10 sec. If the target is a Boss, deals 111456 additional M.DMG that ignores DEF.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases DMG by 70%.

Advancement Phase 2
Reduces Skill Activation Requirements by 5 sec.

name: Glory of the God King, Zaries
description: Summons the soul of Glory of the God King, Zaries for 10 sec, increasing P.DMG all enemies take by 25%, and increases ATK Spd of self by 500 for the duration of the skill.
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 6 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Increases DEF Penetration of self by 500 for the duration of the Skill.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the duration by 4 sec, and becomes immune to CC for the duration of the Skill.

name: Form of Ultimate Destruction, Barbatos Gigante
description: Resonates with the soul of Form of Ultimate Destruction, Barbatos Gigante, creating [Authority of the Demon God] upon self, dealing M.DMG to enemies within range, and inflicting Stun for 4 sec. Afterward, the soul of Form of Ultimate Destruction, Barbatos Gigante remains for 10 sec. Lucikiel cannot use any Skills for the duration of the soul, but his ATK Spd increases by 400, All DMG taken reduces by 30%, DMG of normal attacks increases by 2 , normal attacks deal DMG that ignores DEF, dealing 50% DMG to the target’s nearby enemies. If Lucikiel kills an enemy while his soul remains, he creates [Authority of the Demon God].
charge_type: Charges up upon using Skills 3 times.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
Upon using the Soul Weapon Skill, Lucikiel dispels negative effects from self and dispels positive effects from targets hit by the first soul-resonating.

Advancement Phase 2
Increases the duration of the soul by 5 sec and reduces Cooldown by 5 sec. Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the soul.

name: Encroaching Darkness, Leifende
description: Summons the soul of Encroaching Darkness, Leifende for 10 sec, dealing P.DMG equal to 5% own Max HP to frontal enemies in range every 3 sec. Each hit increases P.DMG the target takes by 30% for 5 sec. For the duration of the soul, increases DMG dealt to enemies of Shakmeh and the ally with the highest ATK excluding self by 10%.
charge_type: Charges up over 20 sec.
advancement:
Advancement Phase 1
For the duration of the soul, recovers Mana by 400 sec.

Advancement Phase 2
Changes the Skill Activation Requirements to 15 sec and DMG Boost against enemies to 20%.
